classes.name: multi-step-wizard
classes.description: A container around the Multi-step Wizard

classes.name: multi-step-wizard--horizontal
classes.description: Modifier to create a horiztonal wizard

classes.name: multi-step-wizard--accordion
classes.description: Modifier to create an accordion wizard

classes.name: multi-step-wizard--floating-panel
classes.description: Modifier to create a floating panel wizard

classes.name: multi-step-wizard--chevron
classes.description: Modifier to create a chevron wizard

classes.name: multi-step-wizard--accordion-secondary
classes.description: Modifier to create an accordion wizard in the secondary style

classes.name: multi-step-wizard--elevation
classes.description: Modifier to add elevation to a component

classes.name: multi-step-wizard__grabber
classes.description: Grab handle for the floating panel

classes.name: multi-step-wizard__grabber--icon
classes.description: Grab icon for the floating panel

classes.name: multi-step-wizard__button--complete
classes.description: Completed state of an individual item/button

classes.name: multi-step-wizard__panel--position-secondary
classes.description: Secondary position for floating panel content

classes.name: multi-step-wizard__chevron-arrow
classes.description: Secondary position for the chevron option

description:
The **multi-step wizard** component is utilized to visually represent and
navigate a sequence of steps in a linear process in addition to communicating
feedback to the user as to the status of progress made on said steps.
name: Multi-step Wizard
usage:
Visually represent and navigate a sequence of steps in a linear process. #### Markup Example ```html
```
